common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: common.error_server
error_list.description: Something is wrong. Please try later.

params: {"request_params":[{"name":"page_no","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"1","type":"int32","description":"Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Default to be 1 and allowed input is from 1 - 5000.","key":"wmYJhmi"},{"name":"page_size","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"100","type":"int32","description":"Use the 'page_size' filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). Default to be 20 and allowed input is from 1- 100.","key":"JrpiEDj"},{"name":"status","limits":"all/ongoing/upcoming/expired","required":"True","sample":"all","type":"string","description":"The status filter for retrieving voucher list. Available value: upcoming/ongoing/expired/all.","key":"XWTmtFb"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"error","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"EGMFyR"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"message","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"GHFWwPG"},{"sample":"c926b49d489a143f415e7197adc9686b","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"The identifier of the API request for error tracking.","key":"RCxPyHw"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"Detailed informations you are querying.","name":"response","children":[{"sample":"true","type":"boolean","name":"more","description":"This is to indicate whether the comment list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of comments.","key":"itBriGJ"},{"sample":"","type":"object[]","description":"The list of voucher.","name":"voucher_list","children":[{"sample":"395841407827968","type":"int64","name":"voucher_id","description":"The unique identifier for a voucher.","key":"EsfTWfk"},{"sample":"TESTTEST1","type":"string","name":"voucher_code","description":"Voucher Code","key":"JNdxpPx"},{"sample":"test voucher","type":"string","name":"voucher_name","description":"Voucher Name","key":"Sxjtkwx"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"voucher_type","description":"The type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.","key":"HctjjHk"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"reward_type","description":"The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.","key":"nGjJpHp"},{"sample":"11","type":"int32","name":"usage_quantity","description":"The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.","key":"PnwdTPC"},{"sample":"0","type":"int32","name":"current_usage","description":"Up till now, how many times has this particular voucher already been used.","key":"SkmEThe"},{"sample":"1656647700","type":"timestamp","name":"start_time","description":"The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use. ","key":"JYzeDky"},{"sample":"1659243300","type":"timestamp","name":"end_time","description":"The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use. ","key":"JcBGstM"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"is_admin","description":"If the voucher is created by Shopee or not.","key":"jkNSmjH"},{"sample":"0","type":"int32","name":"voucher_purpose","description":"The use case for the voucher. The available values are: 0: normal; 1: welcome, 2: referral; 3: shop_follow; 4:shop_game, 5: free_gift, 6: membership","key":"nDiXMhe"},{"sample":"60.0","type":"float","name":"discount_amount","description":"The discount amount set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a fix amount voucher, api will return a value.","key":"MnFjxFj"},{"sample":"10","type":"int32","name":"percentage","description":"The discount percentage set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher, api will return a value.","key":"mJJYinW"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"cmt_voucher_status","description":"The voucher status in CMT. The available values are: 1:review, 2: approved, 3:reject. Only when this voucher is attending CMT campaign and not being rejected, api will return a value.","key":"yretSpy"},{"sample":"1638342000","type":"timestamp","name":"display_start_time","description":"The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.","key":"RyXnEZc"}],"key":"mwbMks"}],"key":"SGRNtrY"}]}

update_log_list.content: Optimize the Sample information of Request Parameter and Response Parameter
Response Parameter add new field display_start_time
